title: Post-Global Financial Crisis: Find a new global financial order says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) The global economic crisis taught the world many lessons. Those lessons varied across nations. But all countries learnt common as well as individual lessons, from this crisis. In general, the crisis left behind, a trail of serious damage across nations and shook the very foundations…
